name: Opera Extension
summary: Learn about .OEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: OEX files were introduced with Opera 11. The file format is based on the W3C Widget specification.

description: Extension file used by the Opera Web browser; contains data that adds new functionality to the application; can be used for user interface widgets, such as buttons and search bars, or for running hidden functions in the background.
